titleInfo.title: Expanding the research data management service portfolio at Bielefeld University according to the three-pillar principle towards data FAIRness

name.namePart: Continuous quality control for research data to ensure reproducibility

bibliographicCitation.ama: Schirrwagen J, Cimiano P, Ayer V, et al. Expanding the research data management service portfolio at Bielefeld University according to the three-pillar principle towards data FAIRness. Presented at the Göttingen-CODATA RDM Symposium 2018, Göttingen.
